# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Tells you when to initialize a video node that was created from an archive.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

```swift
init?(coder aDecoder: NSCoder)
```

## Discussion

Do not call this initializer yourself; it is called by the system when you should intialize a video node that was created from an archive.

## Creating a Video Node

- **init(avPlayer:)**: Initializes a video node using an existing [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayer] object.
- **init(fileNamed:)**: Initializes a video node using a video file stored in the app bundle.
- **init(url:)**: Initializes a video node using a URL.
- **init(videoFileNamed:)**: Initializes a video node using a video file stored in the app bundle.
- **init(videoURL:)**: Initializes a video node using a URL that points to a video file.
